#Text=Q :
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I live in ward 33 , so it was convenient , but also it is next door to my long standing home in scarborough where I grew up the past 30 years .
#Text=I understand the social , political , economic , and cultural fabric of toronto , ontario , and canadian society .
#Text=I have lived almost my entire life in East Toronto , so am familiar with all the issues and cultural demands .
#Text=In short , East Toronto is not a theater for police to terrorize in the media , nor a war games playground , whereby asians are used as an instrument to justify excessive police budgets .
#Text=Q :
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=A :

#Text=I have focused my life 's work on understanding and publishing on issues of big picture importance to 3 levels of government to ensure that Canada does not become the social , political , economic , and moral bankruptcy of the United States .
#Text=And I am content to see the benefits of my hard work the past few years .
#Text=I am a very charitable time giving person .
#Text=I committed my time and abilities to the causes I feel will most benefit society , for instance :
#Text=-Daily bread food bank , -Ont .
#Text=Council for Int .
#Text=Cooperation , -World Vision Refugee Center
#Text=-United Way fundraising and CN Tower climb supplier .
#Text=-Sueing three levels of government for environmental , transit , education , health , justice reform issues .
#Text=-resolving traffic issues at kennedy+steeles , 404/401 ramps , Leslie/401 ,
#Text=-federal funds to rebuild the poorest region in Canada - Regent Park ,
#Text=-Youth justice system reforms - mitigating 600 % Criminal code conviction rate more than adults .
#Text=-2004 Canadian police per capita budgeting model to reduce excessive police budgets - ignored by city council todate .
#Text=-
#Text=Environmental groups , researching and publishing papers to local MP , MPPs , and city council that are urgent .
#Text=Q :
#Text=What does Toronto mean to you ?
#Text=A :
#Text=The past decade has been one of stagnation for several reasons :
#Text=First , fiscal slash and burn policies by Federal Liberals , and Ontario Conservatives .
#Text=Second , Police and TTC unions rape and extort the tax payers for unending higher wages .

#Text=Let me be very clear , THE PUBLIC IS NOT A BANK ROLE FOR UNIONS TO MAKE RIDICULOUS WAGE DEMANDS UPON SO THEIR SALARIES KEEP PACE WITH INFLATION - this is the role of banks and financial markets !
#Text=The result of this is Toronto has become a welfare state that is headed for bankruptcy - if things do not change quickly .
#Text=Toronto must be a model mega city in our global village .
#Text=Toronto must demonstrate leadership in private and public sector innovation to ensure social , political , and economic growth .
#Text=A homeless man or young child should be able to walk into a court and find justice -with little or no cost , and without fear of persecution .
